message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to be selling this product which I believe you'll find valuable. I'm asking for $22,000 to start. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $22,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $12,000.
Bob, I appreciate you countering.  While I'm motivated to sell, $12,000 is quite a ways below my bottom line. Could you do $18,000? This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $18,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again at $14,000.
